dmca.title: ExtrasForMovies.com objects to extra copies of its web code
dmca.body:
Per your website I am providing this information via written notification by fax but also sent via email to back up. The websites below has taken my navigation content and added in the source code of their websites in manner to be invisible except to search engines.

What they appear to have done is take my navigation and hidden it inside their webpage. If you view source code on their sites you will see all my navigation content. My website is http://www.extrasformovies.com

I used my copyscape banner to detect this and the two offending sites are:

http://www.firstmodelplace.com/modeling_schools.php
http://www.onetalentsearch.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above, as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private] Webmaster 
[private]@extrasformovies.com 
http://www.extrasformovies.com 
760[private]
